about.title: About
about.description: I am a Full Stack Developer with over 6 years of experience in web development. I am passionate about creating modern, efficient, and user-friendly web applications.
about.name: Full Name
about.locationValue: Di An City, Binh Duong Province, Vietnam
about.careerGoalsDescription: As a dedicated developer, I constantly strive to enhance my skills and contribute value to the company. Each project is an opportunity to demonstrate creativity, problem-solving, and teamwork. I believe that personal growth is linked to collective success, so I always aim to build an efficient and creative work environment. Here are my main career goals:
about.careerGoal1: Become a Technical Lead and mentor young developers
about.careerGoal2: Master advanced technologies and contribute to open-source projects
about.careerGoal3: Build innovative solutions that create positive impact

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description1: Participated in website development and API system for FPT Medicare - a healthcare service platform.
experience.description2: Developed internal systems such as recruitment, bulk email sending, and advertising data analysis.
experience.description3: Participated in developing multiple journalism projects, competitions, events, and online running platform for VnExpress.
experience.description4: Built interface and frontend functionality for ATM system, participated in building company internal website using Laravel 5.
experience.description5: Built e-commerce website using PHP MVC.
experience.responsibility1: Design and program APIs with Django
experience.responsibility2: Guide new developers and review code
experience.responsibility4: Build responsive web applications using Vue.js and Laravel
experience.responsibility5: Optimize database queries and improve application performance
experience.responsibility6: Develop WordPress websites from Figma designs
experience.responsibility8: Build features for collecting and processing data from emails
experience.responsibility9: Develop features for automated batch email sending
experience.responsibility10: Write unit tests, create salary service and candidate evaluation
experience.responsibility11: Participate in development and maintenance of Startup website
experience.responsibility12: Participate in development and maintenance of sections: Science Innovation Contest, Cooking, Vaccine
experience.responsibility13: Develop SPA and webservice for running race - Vrace
experience.responsibility14: Design API, background processing using queue service
experience.responsibility16: Digitize daily repetitive manual tasks using RPA akabot
experience.responsibility17: Develop interface using Angular 7 based on existing template
experience.responsibility19: Participate in outsourcing project for POS system on automatic vending machines of global corporation Glory
experience.responsibility21: Learn and apply first team workflow
